articles.title: Benchmark’s Peter Fenton Isn’t Ready to Call This an AI Bubble
articles.summary: Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kate Clark sits down with Benchmark partner Peter Fenton to talk about the firm’s investment strategy in an era dominated by artificial intelligence startups.
articles.translated_title: Benchmark’s Peter Fenton Isn’t Ready to Call This an AI Bubble

articles.title: Salesforce’s Struggling Stock Needs Earnings to Show AI Progress
articles.summary: After months of pain, Salesforce Inc. investors will be scrutinizing the software maker’s upcoming earnings for signs it will be a winner in the artificial intelligence boom — or one of its most high-profile victims.
articles.translated_title: Salesforce’s Struggling Stock Needs Earnings to Show AI Progress
articles.translated_summary: After months of pain, Salesforce Inc. investors will be scrutinizing the software maker’s upcoming earnings for signs it will be a winner in the artificial intelligence boom — or one of its most high-profile victims.

articles.title: Anthropic Stake Propels Qatar’s $524 Billion Wealth Fund Deeper Into AI
articles.summary: When Anthropic went looking for more money to support its pursuit of building artificial intelligence models, the startup turned to a familiar network of venture capitalists. It also opened the door to a source of capital it had previously ignored: Middle Eastern sovereign wealth.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic Stake Propels Qatar’s $524 Billion Wealth Fund Deeper Into AI
articles.translated_summary: When Anthropic went looking for more money to support its pursuit of building artificial intelligence models, the startup turned to a familiar network of venture capitalists. It also opened the door to a source of capital it had previously ignored: Middle Eastern sovereign wealth.

articles.title: Google's AI rivals get a boost from data-sharing order, but tech giant far from routed
articles.summary: A rising group of artificial intelligence companies stand to gain from an antitrust ruling on Tuesday that ordered Alphabet's Google to share its invaluable search data with competitors.
articles.translated_title: Google's AI rivals get a boost from data-sharing order, but tech giant far from routed
articles.translated_summary: A rising group of artificial intelligence companies stand to gain from an antitrust ruling on Tuesday that ordered Alphabet's Google to share its invaluable search data with competitors.

articles.title: The AI Pioneer Trying to Save Artificial Intelligence From Big Tech
articles.summary: Ashish Vaswani helped usher in modern AI. Now he’s wondering if we’re doing it all wrong.
articles.translated_title: The AI Pioneer Trying to Save Artificial Intelligence From Big Tech

articles.title: The connected customer
articles.summary: As brands compete for increasingly price conscious consumers, customer experience (CX) has become a decisive differentiator. Yet many struggle to deliver, constrained by outdated systems, fragmented data, and organizational silos that limit both agility and consistency. The current wave of artificial intelligence, particularly agentic AI that can reason and act across workflows, offers a powerful…

articles.title: Australia's central bank exploring how AI can affect economy, governor says
articles.summary: Australia's central bank is exploring how emerging technologies like artificial intelligence could influence the economy, with possible implications for inflation and the labour market, its governor said on Wednesday.
articles.translated_title: Australia's central bank exploring how AI can affect economy, governor says
articles.translated_summary: Australia's central bank is exploring how emerging technologies like artificial intelligence could influence the economy, with possible implications for inflation and the labour market, its governor said on Wednesday.

articles.title: RBA Staff ‘Feeling the Weight’ of AI, Tech Shift, Governor Says
articles.summary: Reserve Bank of Australia staff are “feeling the weight” of its technological transformation agenda, Governor Michele Bullock said, adding that the use of big data and artificial intelligence has the potential to transform policy making.
articles.translated_title: RBA Staff ‘Feeling the Weight’ of AI, Tech Shift, Governor Says
articles.translated_summary: Reserve Bank of Australia staff are “feeling the weight” of its technological transformation agenda, Governor Michele Bullock said, adding that the use of big data and artificial intelligence has the potential to transform policy making.

articles.title: Marc Benioff Isn't Sold On AGI Hype, Says He's 'Extremely Suspect' Despite AI Shaping Salesforce Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
articles.summary: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff dismissed hype around artificial general intelligence as "hypnosis," saying today's AI is powerful but not conscious, even as the company cuts jobs, boosts productivity with AI agents, and prepares to report second-quarter earnings.
